sentences.en: Darling had put the children to bed in unwonted silence and lit their night - lights.
sentences.cn: 他们听得见娜娜的吠声,约翰呜咽着说:“这都是因为他把她拴在院子里了. ”

sentences.en: Every one was worried, and most people were leading lives of unwonted discomfort.
sentences.cn: 每个人忧心如焚, 大部分人过着非同寻常的艰苦生活.
格雷丝变得异常严肃起来.
他讲话显得出人意料地热心。

sentences.en: It was as Hester said unwonted jollity that brightened the faces of the people.
sentences.cn: 海丝特说得不错,人们的脸上确实闪耀着非同凡响的欢乐.

sentences.en: It'showed Pearl in an unwonted aspect.
sentences.cn: 这表现出珠儿的不同往常的另一副面孔.

sentences.en: PetroChina's site is much better but has been struggling to keep unwonted attention this week.
sentences.cn: 相比之下,中石油的网站要好得多,但也一直是在勉强对付这一周以来罕有的关注.

sentences.en: There was an unwonted light in his eyes, and slight trembling of his lips.
sentences.cn: 他的眼睛闪耀着一种不同寻常的光彩, 他的嘴唇在颤动.
这说明当时他那种从未有过的惊慌.

sentences.en: This consciousness again brought the unwonted color to her cheeks.
sentences.cn: 这种念头又使她的双颊升起了少有的红潮.

sentences.en: This unwonted substitution of warm for cold waters had disastrous effects upon the fish.
sentences.cn: 这样非比寻常的以温水代替冷水对鱼有极坏的影响.

words.tran_cn: 不习惯的；不寻常的；少有的

trans.tran_cn: 不平常的，异常的，不习惯的
trans.tran_en: unusual and not what you expect to happen
